short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New Tab extension for Awesome people.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ATab (Awesome Tab) is the perfect new tab extension for awesome people who want to elevate their browsing experience. With ATab, you'll get a beautifully designed new tab page that's fully customizable and packed with useful features. You can easily access all your bookmarks, see a list of your open tabs, and search the web right from the page.

ATab is the perfect tool for anyone who wants to take their browsing to the next level. Whether you're a student, professional, or just a casual user, ATab makes it easy to stay organized, focused, and productive. So why settle for a boring new tab page when you can have the awesome ATab?
